properties.name: application.name
properties.description: Name of the application. Defaults to Maven project artifact id

properties.name: build.version
properties.description: Application version. Defaults to Maven project version

properties.name: build.timestamp
properties.description: Application build timestamp. Defaults to Maven project build timestamp

properties.name: application.email.no_reply
properties.description: Application 'reply to' email used for emails sent

properties.name: application.security.public-key-path
properties.description: The public key path to the JKS file

properties.name: application.security.private-key-path
properties.description: The private key path to the JKS file for signing JWT tokens

properties.name: application.security.private-key-pair
properties.description: The private key pair (alias used when generated JKS)

properties.name: application.security.signing-key
properties.description: The symmetric key for signing JWT tokens

properties.name: application.data.demo
properties.description: Enable initialization of database with some demonstration data

properties.name: application.data.domain_name
properties.description: The domain name used to generate default (and demo) user email addresses

properties.name: application.data.admin_password
properties.description: The password for the default admin user. Leave empty for automatic password generation

properties.name: application.welcome.ascii_art
properties.description: A welcome ASCII art to display on application startup
